long_description: You've signed up for your next big running race, now get the gear to help you meet your goal. The Marmot Tilden Running visor helps you keep a cool head, and it shades your face from the sun. Lightweight polyester mesh keeps your head cool when you're working hard. Reflective hits increase visibility in low light. Marmot Tilden Running visor includes an adjustable strap in back for a perfect fit.
short_description: You've signed up for your next big running race, now get the gear to help you meet your goal. The Marmot Tilden Running visor helps you keep a cool head, and it shades your face from the sun.
